metadata.title: CVE-2021-46873 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description: WireGuard, such as WireGuard 0.5.3 on Windows, does not fully account forthe possibility that an adversary might be able to set a victim's systemtime to a future value, e.g., because unauthenticated NTP is used. This canlead to an outcome in which one static private key becomes permanentlyuseless.

criterions.comment: wireguard package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
